title: China’s promise of prosperity brought Laos debt — and distress
description: China funded much of the new infrastructure that transformed Laos. But the land-locked country of 7.5 million is in economic distress because of its debt.

title: Blinken invokes Jewish ancestry in address to grieving Israeli public
description: The secretary of state expressed unreserved support for Israel on a breakneck trip across the Middle East to prevent a wider war.

title: Online posts about Israel-Gaza war are costing some people their jobs
description: The backlash has been directed toward people of different backgrounds: a law student, an airline pilot, a basketball writer and an adult-content influencer.

title: Israel announces aim to end Hamas as civilian casualties in Gaza soar
description: The incursion upended a years-long stalemate between Israel and Hamas, and Israeli leaders are foreshadowing a ground invasion that seeks to change the status quo forever.

title: Israel transforms itself for war as Gaza invasion looms
description: As the worlds awaits Israel’s next response to the Hamas surprise attack, Israel is turning into a country at war.

title: Hamas took at least 64 captives into Gaza, visual evidence suggests
description: The hostages include nine children, according to an examination of hundreds of videos and images posted on social media since the fighting began.

title: Israel formed a unity government. Who’s in the new emergency war cabinet?
description: Opposition leader Benny Gantz and Defense Minister Yoav Gallant joined Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu to create a new war cabinet to oversee war with Hamas.

title: Is the U.S. getting involved as Israel fights Hamas in Gaza? What to know.
description: President Biden said the U.S. stands with Israel as the military dispatched a carrier strike group to the eastern Mediterranean sea to deter a widening war.

title: Russia mounts major attack on key city in eastern Ukraine
description: Russia has mobilized thousands of troops and columns of armored vehicles in an effort to capture Avdiivka, which sits in a strategic pocket close to the Russian-occupied city of Donetsk.

title: Filipino and Thai workers in Israel narrowly escape death
description: Amid the horrific stories of death in southern Israel, migrant workers from Thailand and the Philippines also dodged the violence, with some still hostage.

title: A mom, her girls and festival-goers: The captives Hamas took to Gaza
description: Families of Doron Asher Katz and her daughters, Aviv and Raz, Omer Wenkert and Omer Shem-Tov say they are being held in Gaza as Israel wages war with Hamas.

title: Where heat worsens hunger
description: Malnourished children in war-torn Yemen struggle to survive as temperatures rise. In the city of Hodeida, climate change and hunger converge in brutal ways.

title: Biden says the border wall is ineffective. Here are key things to know.
description: When reporters asked President Biden if he thought border barriers were effective, he flatly said “no.” Here are some key things to know about the border wall.

title: Israeli strikes have pummeled Gaza. Now a land invasion is imminent.
description: Israel’s military says it has carried out more 2,000 strikes across the territory since Saturday. The Washington Post mapped some of the most devastating strikes.

title: Ukraine live briefing: Putin on first known trip abroad since ICC warrant; allies to build Ukrainian F-16 capacity
description: Russian President Vladimir Putin travels to Kyrgyzstan for talks, his first known overseas foray since the International Criminal Court issued a warrant for his arrest.

title: Live updates: Humanitarian crisis unfolds in Gaza; Blinken to visit Israel
description: More than 338,000 people have been displaced in Gaza, the United Nations said, with Israel’s siege causing critical shortages of electricity, food and water.

title: In eastern Ukraine, small assault teams quietly advance against Russia
description: Ukrainian soldiers conducting daring missions in small groups are making gains on the eastern front but face higher risks of fighting the enemy at close range.

title: What is Hezbollah, the militant group on Israel’s northern border?
description: Hezbollah and Israel, longtime enemies, have traded shelling since Hamas’s weekend attack on Israel.

title: War in Gaza complicates Ukraine battle for both Zelensky and Putin
description: Saturday’s shocking attacks in Israel and an impending war in the Gaza Strip could cause problems for both Kyiv and Moscow.

title: More than 20 Americans were killed in Israel. Here’s what we know so far.
description: A scholar. A former nurse. A Missouri native who died shielding her teenage son. They’re among the Americans killed in Saturday’s terrorist attacks in Israel.
